titles.title: Commending the present Army Nurse Corps for extending equal opportunities to men and women, and recognizing the brave and honorable service during and before 1955 of men who served as Army hospital corpsmen and women who served in the Army Nurse Corps.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.
Mr. McCollum asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 4/12/2000--Introduced. Commends the present Army Nurse Corps for extending equal opportunities to men and women. Recognizes the service during and before 1955 of: (1) men who served as Army hospital corpsmen; and (2) women who served in the Corps.
